description.value:
[Social]

Prerequisites Tier 3 with the Envoy's Alliance

Cost 2 Fame

Effect You and your allies treat your effective character levels as 1 lower for the purpose of the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Raise Dead]{Raise Dead} spell and the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Resurrect]{Resurrect} ritual.

This applies to both the level of the spell or ritual required, as well as to calculating the cost of the diamonds necessary to cast the spell or perform the ritual.
